contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 1st day of June, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the Order of the Superior Court is REVERSED, and the matter is REMANDED to the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County consistent with this Court’s opinion in Jacobs v. Halloran, — Pa. -, 710 A.2d 1098 (1998) and Marino v. Hackman, — Pa. -, 710 A.2d 1108 (1998).
